landing-intro.what-i-do: I help businesses to build their digital products

featured-projects.look-at-3: I make projects that enhance my skillset into reality

landing-about.who-am-i-desc-1: Striving to become a successful Developer, his journey commenced in 2014 at the age of 12, experimenting with 'Skript' a Python-like scripting language for Minecraft. Addressing performance concerns, he transitioned to Java, mastering the Bukkit API, a Minecraft-specific interface.
landing-about.who-am-i-desc-2: He published free plugins in the community.In this term he learnt about abstract concepts through Java.He had an 2 months long internship in the Europe as a Frontend Developer.With a passion for programming as a longtime hobby, he aspires to excel as developer. Presently, he's immersed in Fullstack projects

services.title: Our Services
services.service-1-description: I build websites that are fast, secure, and easy to use. I use the latest technologies to create websites that are responsive and accessible.

CTA.text: See the impact of good development practices on your business.

contact-form.have-in-mind: Have a project in mind? Looking for a developer? Reach out to me using the form below. I will get back to you under 48 hours.
contact-form.name: Name
contact-form.content-min: Description must be at least 20 characters long
contact-form.content-max: Description must be at most 1000 characters long

about.detail: Over the past years, I have been working as a software developer. I have experience in developing web applications using React, Next.js, and Node.js. I have also worked on mobile applications using React Native. I am a self-taught developer and I am always eager to learn new technologies.

faq.description: Here are some of the most frequently asked questions. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out to me.

follow-me.title: Follow me
follow-me.about: I'm Emirhan, a developer who builds digital products.
